data.title: Product Labels & Badges by BSS Commerce
data.meta_description: Product Labels & Badges is an app that helps merchants optimize products for better conversion rates. The app can create labels, badges & stickers for products. data.meta_site_name: Essential Apps - Essential Apps for Your Shopify Store
data.text:
Product Labels & Badges is an app that helps merchants optimize products for better conversion rates. The app can create labels, badges & stickers for products. They can be displayed on the product images, product pages, home pages & other pages in merchants’ stores. This helps visitors catch the sight and go to the product page.

To sum up, Shopify product label is like a powerful CTA to stimulate and urge buyers to make decisions faster.

Highlighting features:

– 10,000+ pre-designed labels & badges

– Custom labels/ badges design

– Set up priority & conditions for labels/ badges

– Unlimited label position, label per variant

– Aids visitors in catching the eye and proceeding to the product page

– Premium features for better sales motivation strategy
